LanguageData.RecruitRelationshipDamage.label: recruit relationship damage
LanguageData.RecruitRelationshipDamage.description: The damage done to the relationship with the faction of this person when successfully recruiting.
LanguageData.ForcedRecruitRelationshipDamage.label: forced recruit relationship damage
LanguageData.ForcedRecruitRelationshipDamage.descript: The damage done to the relationship with the faction of this person when forcefully recruiting.
LanguageData.RecruitEffectivity.label: recruit effectiveness factor
LanguageData.RecruitEffectivity.description: The effectiveness when trying to charm visitors to join your faction.
